Learn to use the strengths of each weapon and create deadly fighting combos!
Declare that strategy is worth more than numerical advantage, then prove it on the battlefield!

item.title: Atelier Resleriana: Forgotten Alchemy and the Polar Night Liberator
item.description:
About This Game

Atelier Resleriana: Forgotten Alchemy and the Polar Night Liberator

Long ago, the kingdom of Lantarna prospered from the blessings of a white comet that passed overhead. The art of harnessing the comet's blessings was called alchemy, and the practitioners of this art were known as alchemists.
However, when the comet disappeared and its blessings were no longer available, the use of alchemy gradually declined and was eventually forgotten.

Many years have passed, and in a corner of Lantarna two girls have a fateful meeting.
One is Resna, who has found hope in alchemy and is on her way to the Capital, aiming to travel to the World’s End where the source of the miracle is said to lie.
The other is Valeria, a girl who has lost her memories and now lives in the city while doing rough work as an adventurer for the Moonlight Society.

Behind them looms the shadow of the group known as the Polar Night Alchemists, a dark organization shrouded in mystery.
With different motives and ambitions intertwined, the two eventually come closer to the truth that lies dormant on the continent.

GAME SYSTEM

New Adventures with a New Protagonist
An epic adventure with a new protagonist, the first one in four years since the release of “Atelier Ryza.” Embark on this adventure to revive alchemy with a cast of charming characters!

High-Quality 3D Characters in Action
The latest technology developed for the Atelier series has been used to create 3D graphics equivalent to the latest console titles. Enjoy this cinematic story filled with beautiful high-quality characters!

A Tactical, Timeline-Based Battle System
Simple timeline-style command battles and dynamic skill visuals make for a fun and entertaining battle experience. The "Effects Panel" has a variety of effects that can be used to build a strategy to gain an advantage in battles!

An Easy-to-Use, Yet Profound Synthesis System
The synthesis system, a signature feature of the Atelier series, is optimized for easy and rewarding play. Combine the traits assigned to the characters and materials to create your optimal solution!

A System to Upgrade All Characters
Characters can be enhanced in a variety of ways, such as by using items and equipment created through synthesis, and the Growboards, which increase character parameters. Build the strongest and best party, then embark on an alchemical adventure!

STAFF

[Original Story, Series Composition, Scenario Supervisor]
　　TAKAHIRO (Representative works: "YUKI YUNA IS A HERO" series, "Chained Soldier," and more)

[Atelier Series Supervisor]
　　Shinichi Yoshiike

[Character Designers]
　　Umiu Geso/tokki/NOCO

[Theme song/Insert Song Vocalist]
　　reche
　　Haruka Shimotsuki
　　Celeina Ann
　　Rico Sasaki
　　SAK.
　　…and more

[Development and Operation]
　　KOEI TECMO GAMES CO., LTD.
　　Akatsuki Games Inc.

※This application is targeted at users age 16 and above.

item.title: Apollo Justice: Ace Attorney Trilogy
item.description:
About This Game



Apollo Justice's Legal Journey Begins Anew!

Join rookie attorney Apollo Justice and his mentor, the legendary Phoenix Wright, in this collection of 3 games! This title features the 14 episodes of "Apollo Justice: Ace Attorney", "Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - Dual Destinies", and "Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - Spirit of Justice", and the 2 previously DLC-only Special Episodes for a total of 16 episodes!

Also included is a mountain of extra goodies that's sure to satisfy any Ace Attorney fan!

Orchestra Hall - Listen to the in-game background music and select orchestral arrangements!

Art Library - View illustrations, design specs, commissioned pieces, and even the special Spirit of Justice Prologue anime!

Animation Studio - Play around with character animations and recreate your favorite scenes!

This collection supports Japanese, English, French, German, Korean, and Traditional and Simplified Chinese. Mix and match to play in whichever languages you'd like!

Immerse yourself in this beautiful collection as you shout "Objection!" in these newly renovated halls of justice!

Some of the contents of the games in this collection are presented as initially released to preserve the games as originally created.

item.title: Red Glare
item.description:
About This Game

Red Glare is a WW2 real-time tactics game where you play agents of the OSS, the precursor to the CIA, combating a secret German expedition in South America. With five well balanced characters and a story campaign playing out across a continent with jungle, desert, and snow maps, this game will revive your old-school memories of real-time tactics.

KEY FEATURES

  • Dynamic Day/Night cycles in each map, giving new scenarios in the same missions. Nighttime makes for easier sneaking as enemies’ view cones become shorter except Enemies with flash lights and enemy snipers. Enemies can not see footprints at Night.
  • Dynamic weather system, such as rain reducing the noise of guns.
  • In addition to the story campaign, the Challenges section will offer continually added maps.
  • Enemies can detect blood trails left by moving bodies killed by knife or gun shots, so players will have to be creative with takedowns, such as poison syringe and wire kills do not cause enemy to bleed.
  • Wide variety of enemies, including Tanks, Dogs, and Snipers.
  • Optimized huge maps filled with more than 200 enemies, more than ever seen in a real-time tactics game.
  • And many more gameplay details.

I am a Solo game developer and a fan of real time tactics genre so i combined all the ideas of old classic and modern games and mixed them with my own ideas to make a perfect real time tactics game.

item.title: Sect And Monsters
item.description:
About This Game

This is an idle game in which a team of 4 people is formed to grind equipment + collect and produce resources, and develop equipment and characters.
In ancient times, there was a powerful sect that was guarding the peace of this land. However, this time the world has changed, the monsters are particularly ferocious. When the sect is about to survive, you are here. It is up to you to run this sect and shoulder all responsibilities. .
  • The sect is divided into three parts: servant disciples, cultivators, and elders.
  • You can recruit handyman disciples to chop down trees, dig mines, and collect spiritual stones. The resources obtained can be used to upgrade the sect and recruit monks.
  • You can recruit alchemists to refine blood recovery pills and experience pills for disciples to use.
  • You can recruit Qi Refining Monks, Foundation Establishment Monks, and Nascent Soul Monks to fight monsters and obtain resources and equipment.
  • You can recruit elders to increase the overall buff.
  • You can upgrade your sect and train monks to make them stronger.
  • You can collect magic weapons and artifacts to enhance your sect’s combat strength.
  • Equipment synthesis, gem embedding.

item.title: Jaki's Wacky Adventure
item.description:
About This Game

JWA is an action packed diverse open-world 2.5D action-adventure RPG. Play as Jaki, a powerful & clever ninja fox. Wield your shuriken with deadly accuracy as you dodge enemy fire, avoid lethal hazards & defeat clever enemies. The farther North you travel, the more deadly & crafty your enemies become. Craft powerful potions to improve your odds of survival. Help the local residents – maybe a troll with a pink sock or a yogi with a goat named Nibbler. There is always something quirky, challenging & fun to do in Harmony Haven!

Harmony Haven is full of surprises & Easter eggs for you to discover. Branched dialogue & optional side quests provide interesting choices as you explore strange lands. Start in Eureka, a town full of scientists. Travel to Toon-Town where your skills as a CSI are needed to catch a killer. If you are brave enough, head North to Chillgrave Keep where you match wits with a clever boss.

Can you become the most powerful ninja in the land? Beat your best score to find out.

Game Features


Solve Puzzles, Explore Hidden Areas
Oh No! You fell through a magical portal & now you are trapped.
Are you clever enough to escape?


Battle Bugs, Beasts & Robots to Become the Best Ninja in the Land!
On your journey, encounter numerous powerful & tricky enemies. Wield unique shuriken with deadly accuracy as you dodge enemy fire, avoid lethal hazards & improve your ninja skills. Can you beat your best score & become the best ninja in the land?




Discover Rare Items & Improve Your Skills
Explore hidden areas & discover valuable rare items that level up your skills.


Craft powerful potions!
Collect plants & powerful crystals. Apply crafted potions to ninja stars to increase damage or freeze enemies. Health potions restore health or make you invincible.


Meet interesting characters!
Along your journey, you meet interesting characters. Meet eccentric scientists, like Einstein in Eureka. Or, meet cute lovable characters in Toon Town. Choose to help them with their problems and receive valuable resources which improve your chances of success.


Explore Strange Lands
Many adventures, challenges, and quests await Jaki in the open world of Harmony Haven.


Manage Your Resources
You may buy & sell resources IF you can stand Y-Lee Weasel's prices. Or collect and craft items that improve your skills, enhance your health, or increase damage. Some powerful potions are rare, so use them strategically.

item.title: Oblivion Override
item.description:
About This Game

In a post-apocalyptic wasteland under AI’s iron grip, the remnants of humanity are imprinted in the digital shackles of the ‘Oblivion Code’. To unravel the intricate web of secrets within the dystopian AI civilization, Crimson, a rogue combat bot, embarks on a daring incursion into the neon-drenched corridors of Dulce Base…



  • Stage Four [Temple of Oblivion] leading to the final boss
  • Complete main storyline and hidden endings
  • New female character Mecha
  • More compact maps with special challenge rooms
  • Optimized character progression both inside and outside battles
  • Weapon evolution attributes and the blocking function for initial weapons
  • Game gallery, optimizations, and bug fixes






Master dodges, double jumps, and wall runs to traverse the sprawling underground network. Equip your robot with over 26+ specialized weapons, each featuring unique mechanics, combat choreography, and augmented skill effects.




Unlock six state-of-the-art combat machines and charge into action: from ninja and thunder geek to viking warrior and feline assassin. Centered around their exclusive abilities, Atomic Evolution can be accessed at any point during your run.




Explore the abandoned site of an arms factory, navigate through the maze of a bio-engineered greenhouse, and neutralize all impending threats lurking within the data center, leading you to the enigmatic temple of an ancient-tech civilization…




Dare to crank up the Alert Level from Level I all the way to Level VIII? Brace yourself for far more grueling battles against enemies and bosses on increased hostility and retrofitted with advanced gear.

item.title: Foothold
item.description:
About This Game

In this VR tower defense game, protect your community of survivors from the corrupting forces of Malice. Harness your gravity glove to collect and sling scraps, construct turrets, and guard the builders as they repair the wall.



Wield your gravity glove to:
  • Fight: Capture enemies in your gravity beam and launch to send them packing!
  • Build: Gather scrap metal to build turrets and fortify your defenses.
  • Scan: Uncover the strengths and weaknesses of each enemy type and learn how best to defeat them.



    Battle five different enemy types with their own unique attacks, from small and slimy Bitterness to the heavily-armored tank, Malice—all inspired by Ephesians 4.

item.title: Oops, I Said Yes?!
item.description:
About This Game

This is a Steam version of a hit visual novel game released on the mobile reader app Love 365: Find Your Story by Voltage Inc. It is a collection of romantic, richly illustrated interactive stories with the following premise:

Satisfied with her career and hobbies, the heroine is living her best life without thoughts of matrimony – until one drunken night, she inadvertently ends up married to a certain someone. Now they have to figure out how to pretend their marriage is more than a sham – and learn to get along in private, too.　What starts out as a marriage of convenience turns into a love match. Follow their journey as they get to know one another and learn what it truly means to be partners.
Discover the clever, dramatic tale that is Oops, I Said Yes?! in Love 365: Find Your Story.

An opening movie and adventure feature have been added to the Steam release, so even players that have previously read the app version will discover more things to enjoy.

The Story:
Great job, fulfilling hobbies.
You're loving the single life.

That is, until you end up married
and all on a drunken impulse!

A sparkling ring on your finger, kisses to welcome you home.

It's a marriage of convenience,
so why does it feel like you're falling in love?

Neither your vows nor your wedding certificate
are proof of affection in this case.

Can marriage be a starting point for love?

Characters:
Kunihiro Kasai "Ambitious & Romantic"
Kuranosuke Kiba "Sly & Assertive"
Shu Hasunuma "Brusque & Shy"
Eiji Takao "Haughty & Mysterious"
Ukyo Senkawa "Sexy & Intrepid"

Contents:
Includes Main Stories from the app Love 365: Find Your Story up until "Season 2"

item.title: Supa Fly Racing
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome to Supa Fly Racing, a VR Racer that delivers shots of adrenaline and fun..

Pit your VR racing skills against rival flies as you scramble through various pipe systems that serve as your race track. Begin your racing journey as a Training Fly in the Training Cup and zoom through gentler, introductory tracks, qualifying for each new, more difficult and action packed cup to work your way up to Race Fly, where all hell breaks loose.

Use your head to steer, where you look is where you go. Your throttle is controlled by moving your hands further and closer from your body.

There 4 types of Supa Fly.

TRAINING FLY
Slow to turn and not the fastest. The perfect specs for new players to become comfortable with 3D VR racing.

POO FLY
More aggressively set-up than the Training Fly, agile and performant but still very manageable.

SPORTS FLY
Ready for some serious speed? This is the one.

RACE FLY
Super fast, super agile. This is a hardcore fly to race with.

* 16 Race Pipes including circuits and point to point.
* 4 Championship Cups with a linear progression system that requires at least 3rd place to qualify for the next round.
* Single Race Mode with Pipe Tracks and Supa Flies available once unlocked in Championship Mode.
* Practice Mode with all tracks unlocked and flies available once through progression in Championship Mode.

item.title: Impasse Journey ~ Kaohsiung Chapter ~
item.description:
About This Game

Synopsis


In the year 20XX, the Taiwan Strait War erupted, igniting a massive conflict, and a prolonged stalemate has brought about its first mushroom cloud to end the world, but the outcome of the battle is still in question.

Thirty years later, Taiwan has split into multiple autonomous regions of various sizes. Although the world is silent, humanity is still striving to build a new world amidst the ruins.

As the protagonist, Yang Qiongqi, you will embark on a post-apocalyptic journey to fulfill a promise to your father.

Your first stop is Kaohsiung in which you are dragged into an ongoing feud between the government military and a militia force. How you resolve it will depend on your decisions...

This is a choice-based story of hope as you search for a new life amidst the ruins of a post-apocalyptic world.

The cast




“Suppose one day, my actions are going to clash with your ideals, would you still support me?”

The protagonist who has decided to embark on her journey to search for the truth. Quiet and reserved, she has that unapproachable presence about her, or maybe, she is actually a sentimental girl.



“No, I came here to fulfil my dreams, and prove that I didn't make a wrong decision.”

A young girl who joined the militia to pursue her dreams, hoping for the day when someone could actually understand her, and Qiongqi's arrival has brought about an actual change in her.



“The truth still hurts a little...”

A young girl who has been brought up by the locals in Taiwan, and stayed on the island after the war. As the militia force's vice captain, she has impressive leadership qualities, and always diligent in her duties despite her inaptitude in warfare.



“So, we have to use peaceful and rational iron fists to shatter those stupid dreams. It's quite simple, actually.”

A young girl who is nearly forgotten as an underground dweller when she used to live in the canals below Kaohsiung. She is willing to give her all to help the person she loves to fulfil his dreams. Could she soldier on in her illusory dream bubble?



“Is this line only used by villains? What a joke.”

As an influential envoy from Yunlin-Chiayi-Tainan Autonomous Zone, this young girl has come to Kaohsiung to resolve the ongoing feud, although she does not seem to care too much about it. Perhaps she is simply looking for some spice in her life.



“Before we clashed, we have worked together for a long time, so we're bound to have that camaraderie between us.”

The mayor's most trusted secretary, and an indispensable part of the government military. She has been pushing hard for peace because the most important goal in her life is to stop the war that ended long ago.


Game Features



1Multiple options, your choices in battle will lead you to defeat the enemies.
2.Over 300,000 words of storyline.
3.Descriptions of the local culture and landscape of Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

item.title: Space Nature Attack Tower Defense
item.description:
About This Game



Space Nature Attack TD is a traditional fixed path tower defense that allows you to gain resources per map completed which are used to level up your towers and customize them to suit your own strategies!


Customize your towers!



Distribute skill points among basic stats and a unique tower skill. Then select an element for the tower which will provide an additional effect such as a frost slow or faster electrical projectiles.


Twenty-four maps across three alien planet environments with scaling difficulties!



Each map features a unique modifier to keep gameplay fresh between different levels.

Six difficulty levels are included to provide increasing levels of challenge and
rewards (Including permanent bonuses!). Prepare to face invading monster types at higher difficulties.

item.title: 牧场大作战(Ranch Battle)
item.description:
About This Game

Ranch Battle is a top-down arena shooting light ROGUE game where players take on the role of a character who simultaneously uses four weapons to repel swarms of aliens. Choose from various features and props until rescue arrives.

item.title: Party Animals
item.description:
About This Game

Make Painfully Great Memories with Your Friends in Party Animals.



Mess With Your Friend in 100 Different Ways




Or Together You Could Eliminate Others




Teamwork Is Also Highly Appreciated Here




Especially When Fighting For Gummy Bear

item.title: Six Cabins in Serpent Ridge National Forest
item.description:
About This Game

ABOUT:

Embark on a spine-tingling journey where exploration is key. Traverse the landscape of Serpent Ridge National Forest as you SEARCH FOR LOST KEYS, uncovering the secrets that lurk within the shadows.

Face the unknown and test your survival instincts as you HIDE from the dangers that prowl your surroundings. With every new path you choose to explore, the line between safety and peril becomes increasingly thin. Seek shelter and survive the night, overcoming the challenges that await in this atmospheric walking simulator.

"Six Cabins" seamlessly blends environmental horror with puzzle solving, offering a unique and captivating gaming experience. Can you unravel the mysteries, or will you succumb to the dark forces that linger within the "Six Cabins in Serpent Ridge National Forest"?



CONTROLS:

W A S D - Move
Space Bar - Jump
Left CTRL - Crouch
E - Interact
R - Radio On
F - Radio Channel Scan
Right Mouse Click - Flashlight On/Off
Left Mouse Click - Attack

item.title: UNDER NIGHT IN-BIRTH II Sys:Celes
item.description:
About This Game

Sys:Celes sinks towards ruination.
For the Immortalize, the collapse of all that is, looms on the horizon.
The curtain rises on the final chapter of the Hollow Night. Catastrophe beckons...

Experience the Dramatic Stylish 2D Fighting Action in the latest entry of the UNDER NIGHT IN-BIRTH series!

The first numbered sequel in the series!

▼ Choose from a roster of 24 total characters, with renewed visuals!

3 new characters join the battle: Moonlight Dancer "Twin Barrel Beauty" Kaguya, Indomitable Rampart "Steel Guardian" Tsurugi, and Endless Entity "Eternal Re-Birth" Kuon.
You won’t be able to take your eyes off the intense battles between these 24 fighters with the highly detailed HD pixel art graphics!

▼ Simple inputs make it easy to jump into the fray!

New to fighting games? Not a problem – simple inputs mean even beginners can pull off moves with a single button!

▼ Now supporting rollback netcode for an improved online experience!

With the addition of Casual Matches, it’s easier than ever before to dive in and enjoy online battles.

▼ Introducing new moves and game mechanics!

All characters now boast new moves, such as Hyde’s Blaring Outrage and Linne’s Soaring Dragon.
The new game mechanics Creeping Edge and Celestial Vorpal open up additional depth to gameplay.

▼ The final chapter! A new tale of the Hollow Night…

Sever the cycle. An end to the endless.
May the tale of these countless Nights be concluded, on this eve, the moment of destiny.
A long-awaited continuation to the tale of the Hollow Night unfolds!

item.title: Funny Football
item.description:
About This Game

This is a casual football game. You can control the movement of two football players by your two hands respectively at the same time. It is definitely a challenge to do so, and you sometimes may try to use the keys of football player #1 to control player #2 since those two players will continuously switch position. However, this is the fun part of this game, especially when you play the local PVP mode. The person who makes less mistakes and catches more opportunities will get the final victory. Besides this, this game also provides some other modes like 1v1, 2v2 with AI team member for people who do not enjoy multi task.

This game is currently still on test stage, and we will add more features and game modes into it in the future. It is also possible to make an online PVP mode and create a rank system for it if we get enough support.

Please be free to leave any comments and feedbacks, and they are important for us to keep improving this game.

item.title: Fractal Glide
item.description:
About This Game

About Fractal Glide

Welcome to the captivating world of Fractal Glide, where exploration meets artistry in a symphony of mathematical beauty.

Inspiration

Fractal Glide was born from a deep appreciation for fractals — those infinitely complex, self-replicating patterns found throughout nature and mathematics. These mesmerizing forms have captivated scientists, artists, and dreamers for generations. They offer a glimpse into the hidden order of the universe, a place where mathematics and art intertwine.

The Journey Begins

In Fractal Glide, you take on the role of an intrepid robot explorer navigating a universe of fractal landscapes. As you glide through these extraordinary realms, you'll collect points, make breathtaking discoveries, and witness the sheer beauty of fractals coming to life. But, be careful not to crash!

Features


  • Diverse Fractal Worlds: Immerse yourself in a variety of stunning fractal environments, each with its unique character and challenges.
  • Points and Progression: Collect points as you explore, allowing you to unlock new areas and new robots and delve deeper into the fractal cosmos.
  • Art and Exploration: Fractal Glide is more than a game; it's an artistic experience. Every fractal landscape is a work of art, waiting for you to uncover its secrets.
  • Endless Discovery: With a growing collection of fractal patterns, each playthrough offers a new chance to explore the infinite.

item.title: Bounce ASMR
item.description:
About This Game

You're having a boring day and don't know what to do? Did your teacher give you a failing grade in math because you didn't know the area of the square? Then the best solution to relax is Bounce ASMR!

You can simulate the movements and jumps of the geometric shape as you like!

In total you have the Square, Circle, Triangle, Pentagon and Hexagon. (only the Square you get, the others are included in the DLCs, but that's ok, they are only worth one euro! )

What are you waiting for? I say start the game and relax your eyes a bit.
